name: RapidFire (Jacob Norris)
description:
RapidFire is a sidecrolling, beat'em up game where instead of having to memorize combos, you throw attacks based on randomized colors found on the enemies. The story goes like this:

"You are Bill Bulk, a loving father and doting husband. Everything was perfect...until your family was brutally ripped from you! it was not a car accident, or even a robbery gone wrong...it was electronics!

Glued to their devices, you can barely recognize your family. You've set out from their electronic masters the only way you know how- wtih your fist of fury. EntertainCo and it's minions won't know what hit them."

This was a student project created in 2021 at AIE Seattle by Jacob Norris, Evan Johnson, and Jayden Rieck.
